ServerZoneIpcType.name: InitZone
ServerZoneIpcType.comment: Sent by the server that tells the client which zone to load.

ServerZoneIpcType.name: ActorControlSelf
ServerZoneIpcType.comment: Sent by the server for... something.

ServerZoneIpcType.name: PlayerStats
ServerZoneIpcType.comment: Sent by the server containing character stats.

ServerZoneIpcType.name: PlayerStatus
ServerZoneIpcType.comment: Sent by the server to setup the player on the client.

ServerZoneIpcType.name: UpdateClassInfo
ServerZoneIpcType.comment: Sent by the server to setup class info.

ServerZoneIpcType.name: PlayerSpawn
ServerZoneIpcType.comment: Sent by the server to spawn the player in.

ServerZoneIpcType.name: InitResponse
ServerZoneIpcType.comment: Sent by the server as response to ZoneInitRequest.

ServerZoneIpcType.name: LogOutComplete
ServerZoneIpcType.comment: Sent by the server to indicate the log out is complete.

ServerZoneIpcType.name: Warp
ServerZoneIpcType.comment: Sent by the server to modify the client's position.

ServerZoneIpcType.name: ServerChatMessage
ServerZoneIpcType.comment: Sent by the server when they send a chat message. Usually used for login messages and imminent maintenance notices.

ServerZoneIpcType.name: LinkShellInformation
ServerZoneIpcType.comment: Unknown, but seems to contain information on cross-world linkshells

ServerZoneIpcType.name: PrepareZoning
ServerZoneIpcType.comment: Sent by the server when it wants the client to... prepare to zone?

ServerZoneIpcType.name: ActorMove
ServerZoneIpcType.comment: Sent by the server when actors that aren't the player move.

ServerZoneIpcType.name: SocialList
ServerZoneIpcType.comment: Sent by the server in response to SocialListRequest.

ServerZoneIpcType.name: NpcSpawn
ServerZoneIpcType.comment: Sent by the server to spawn an NPC.

ServerZoneIpcType.name: StatusEffectList
ServerZoneIpcType.comment: Sent by the server to update an actor's status effect list.

ServerZoneIpcType.name: WeatherId
ServerZoneIpcType.comment: Sent by the server when it's time to change the weather.

ServerZoneIpcType.name: UpdateItem
ServerZoneIpcType.comment: Sent to inform the client of an inventory item.

ServerZoneIpcType.name: ContainerInfo
ServerZoneIpcType.comment: Sent to inform the client of container status.

ServerZoneIpcType.name: EventScene
ServerZoneIpcType.comment: Sent to tell the client to play a scene.

ServerZoneIpcType.name: EventStart
ServerZoneIpcType.comment: Sent to tell the client to load a scene, but not play it.

ServerZoneIpcType.name: UpdateHpMpTp
ServerZoneIpcType.comment: Sent to update an actor's hp & mp values.

ServerZoneIpcType.name: ActionResult
ServerZoneIpcType.comment: Sent to inform the client the consequences of their actions.

ServerZoneIpcType.name: Equip
ServerZoneIpcType.comment: Sent to to the client to update their appearance.

ServerZoneIpcType.name: Delete
ServerZoneIpcType.comment: Sent to the client to free up a spawn index.

ServerZoneIpcType.name: EventFinish
ServerZoneIpcType.comment: Sent to the client to stop their currently playing event.

ServerZoneIpcType.name: Condition
ServerZoneIpcType.comment: Sent after EventFinish? it un-occupies the character.

ServerZoneIpcType.name: ActorControlTarget
ServerZoneIpcType.comment: Used to control target information.

ServerZoneIpcType.name: CurrencyCrystalInfo
ServerZoneIpcType.comment: Used to update the player's currencies.

ServerZoneIpcType.name: Config
ServerZoneIpcType.comment: Used to update an actor's equip display flags.

ServerZoneIpcType.name: EventUnkReply
ServerZoneIpcType.comment: Unknown, seen in haircut event.

ServerZoneIpcType.name: PingSyncReply
ServerZoneIpcType.comment: Sent by the server in response to PingReply. In prior expansions, it seems to have had the following additional fields that are now deprecated and used as padding.

ServerZoneIpcType.name: InventoryActionAck
ServerZoneIpcType.comment: Sent by the server to acknowledge when the client is updating their inventory in some way (typically when interacting with shops.)

ServerZoneIpcType.name: UnkResponse2
ServerZoneIpcType.comment: Unsure the true purpose of this, but it's needed for the Unending Journey to function.

ServerZoneIpcType.name: InventoryTransaction
ServerZoneIpcType.comment: Sent by the server to inform the client of when the inventory is being updated (typically when interacting with shops.)

ServerZoneIpcType.name: InventoryTransactionFinish
ServerZoneIpcType.comment: Sent by the server when a sequence of InventoryTransaction packets have concluded.

ServerZoneIpcType.name: ShopLogMessage
ServerZoneIpcType.comment: Sent by the server when an item is obtained from shops that accept gil.

ServerZoneIpcType.name: UpdateInventorySlot
ServerZoneIpcType.comment: Sent by the server typically when a shop transaction takes place, usually to update currency.

ServerZoneIpcType.name: ItemObtainedLogMessage
ServerZoneIpcType.comment: Sent by the server when an item is obtained in ways other than gil shops (e.g. Poetics shops.)

ServerZoneIpcType.name: ContentFinderCommencing
ServerZoneIpcType.comment: Sent to give you the green checkmark before entering a CF zone.

ServerZoneIpcType.name: WalkInEvent
ServerZoneIpcType.comment: Sent by the server when walking over a trigger (e.g. the teleport pads in Solution Nine.)

ServerZoneIpcType.name: Fellowships
ServerZoneIpcType.comment: The fellowships you have joined.

ServerZoneIpcType.name: UnkZoneLoad1
ServerZoneIpcType.comment: Sent shortly after the server sends InitZone, this with UnkZoneLoad2 it makes everything load faster.

ServerZoneIpcType.name: UnkZoneLoad2
ServerZoneIpcType.comment: Sent shortly after the server sends InitZone, this with UnkZoneLoad1 it makes everything load faster.

ServerZoneIpcType.name: Linkshells
ServerZoneIpcType.comment: Sent to inform the client about server-local Linkshells, not to be confused with cross-world ones.

ServerZoneIpcType.name: ChatMessage
ServerZoneIpcType.comment: Sent to nearby clients when a client sends a chat message in the say, yell, or shout channels.

ClientZoneIpcType.name: InitRequest
ClientZoneIpcType.comment: Sent by the client when they successfully initialize with the server, and they need several bits of information (e.g. what zone to load.)

ClientZoneIpcType.name: FinishLoading
ClientZoneIpcType.comment: Sent by the client when they're done loading and they need to be spawned in.

ClientZoneIpcType.name: SocialListRequest
ClientZoneIpcType.comment: Sent by the client when it requests the friends list and other related info.

ClientZoneIpcType.name: LogOut
ClientZoneIpcType.comment: Sent by the client when the user requests to log out.

ClientZoneIpcType.name: Disconnected
ClientZoneIpcType.comment: Sent by the client when it's actually disconnecting.

ClientZoneIpcType.name: SendChatMessage
ClientZoneIpcType.comment: Sent by the client when they send a chat message.

ClientZoneIpcType.name: GMCommand
ClientZoneIpcType.comment: Sent by the client when they send a GM command. This can only be sent by the client if they are sent a GM rank.

ClientZoneIpcType.name: ZoneJump
ClientZoneIpcType.comment: Sent by the client when the character walks into a zone transistion.

ClientZoneIpcType.name: ActionRequest
ClientZoneIpcType.comment: Sent by the client when a character performs an action.

ClientZoneIpcType.name: PingSync
ClientZoneIpcType.comment: Occasionally sent by the client, purpose is unknown.

ClientZoneIpcType.name: UnkCall2
ClientZoneIpcType.comment: Unsure the true purpose of this, but it's needed for the Unending Journey to function.

ClientZoneIpcType.name: StandardControlsPivot
ClientZoneIpcType.comment: This packet is sent by the client when they pivot left or right on standard controls. It is sent once when beginning to pivot, and once when pivoting ends.

ClientZoneIpcType.name: NewDiscovery
ClientZoneIpcType.comment: Sent by the client when they discover a new location on the map.

ClientZoneIpcType.name: GMCommandName
ClientZoneIpcType.comment: Sent by the client when they send a GM command. This can only be sent by the client if they are sent a GM rank.

ClientZoneIpcType.name: RequestBlacklist
ClientZoneIpcType.comment: Seems to happen when opening the Blacklist window.

ClientZoneIpcType.name: RequestFellowships
ClientZoneIpcType.comment: Seems to happen when opening the Fellowships window.

ClientZoneIpcType.name: RequestCrossworldLinkshells
ClientZoneIpcType.comment: Seems to happen when opening the Cross-world Linkshells window. Weird that it can do this, considering it's sent on login?

ClientZoneIpcType.name: SearchFellowships
ClientZoneIpcType.comment: Seems to happen when opening the Fellowship Finder.

ClientZoneIpcType.name: StartCountdown
ClientZoneIpcType.comment: Happens when starting a countdown through the Countdown window.

ServerLobbyIpcType.name: NackReply
ServerLobbyIpcType.comment: Sent by the server to indicate an lobby error occured.

ServerLobbyIpcType.name: LoginReply
ServerLobbyIpcType.comment: Sent by the server to inform the client of their service accounts.

ServerLobbyIpcType.name: ServiceLoginReply
ServerLobbyIpcType.comment: Sent by the server to inform the client of their characters.

ServerLobbyIpcType.name: CharaMakeReply
ServerLobbyIpcType.comment: Sent by the server to inform the client of their characters.

ServerLobbyIpcType.name: GameLoginReply
ServerLobbyIpcType.comment: Sent by the server to tell the client how to connect to the world server.

ServerLobbyIpcType.name: DistWorldInfo
ServerLobbyIpcType.comment: Sent by the server to inform the client of their servers.

ServerLobbyIpcType.name: DistRetainerInfo
ServerLobbyIpcType.comment: Sent by the server to inform the client of their retainers.

ClientLobbyIpcType.name: ServiceLogin
ClientLobbyIpcType.comment: Sent by the client when it requests the character list in the lobby.

ClientLobbyIpcType.name: GameLogin
ClientLobbyIpcType.comment: Sent by the client when it requests to enter a world.

ClientLobbyIpcType.name: LoginEx
ClientLobbyIpcType.comment: Sent by the client after exchanging encryption information with the lobby server.

ClientLobbyIpcType.name: CharaMake
ClientLobbyIpcType.comment: Sent by the client when they request something about the character (e.g. deletion.)

ServerChatIpcType.name: LoginReply
ServerChatIpcType.comment: Sent by the server to Initialize something chat-related?

ServerChatIpcType.name: TellMessage
ServerChatIpcType.comment: Sent by the server in response to a client sending a private message to another client.

ServerChatIpcType.name: PartyMessage
ServerChatIpcType.comment: Sent by the server in response to a client sending a private message to another client.

ClientChatIpcType.name: SendTellMessage
ClientChatIpcType.comment: Sent by the client when sending a private message to another client.

ClientChatIpcType.name: SendPartyMessage
ClientChatIpcType.comment: Sent by the client when sending a message to party chat.
